# trailingConfiguration

**Instance Property**

The configuration of the list item’s trailing region.

## Declaration

```swift
var trailingConfiguration: CPMessageListItemTrailingConfiguration? { get set }
```

## Discussion

An instance of [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPMessageListItemTrailingConfiguration] that describes the visual elements of the list item’s trailing region. The region can show a [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPMessageTrailingItem] and an image.

## Managing Leading and Trailing Configurations

- **leadingConfiguration**: The configuration of the list item’s leading region.
- **CPMessageListItemLeadingConfiguration**: An object that describes the appearance of a message list item’s leading region.
- **CPMessageListItemTrailingConfiguration**: An object that describes the appearance of a message list item’s trailing region.
